title: Luxurious San Antonio Stay on the Historic Riverwalk with Signature Cocktails, Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
Perched above the historic Riverwalk, Thompson San Antonio exudes effortless, moody glamour - a destination as effortlessly chic as its discerning clientele. Bring date night to a dimly lit corner at Landrace, where a seasonal, hyper-local menu from San Antonio’s most esteemed chef takes you on a tantalising epicurean journey. Have a tipple poolside under the shade of a cabana or sip artfully crafted cocktails at the Moon’s Daughters rooftop lounge, dazzling 20 stories above the San Antonio Riverwalk.

On the ground, over 20 kilometres of attractions await, with bustling eateries and hip bars dotted between cultural icons like the San Antonio Museum of Art and the Tobin Center. On your return, the onsite spa beckons, with river rock massages and rose crystal body polishes on the menu, leaving you renewed for another day exploring one of Texas’ most scenic destinations.
offer_address: 115 Lexington Avenue, San Antonio, Texas 78205, United States

title: Charming Spanish-Style San Antonio Escape on the Banks of the River Walk with Courtyard Pool & Onsite Spa
description:
Soak up the charms of a Spanish-style grand hacienda, perched on the banks of the vibrant River Walk in downtown San Antonio's heart. Find yourself within easy reach of some of the city's best shopping, dining and entertainment hubs, hop on a river cruise and explore historical sites like the Alamo - whatever you wish, the hotel's prime location makes it an ideal base.

To unwind, take a stroll along the River Walk or swim laps or lounge by the serene courtyard pool. When hunger strikes, savour South Texan cuisine with Latin and French influences at Four Brothers and sip on exquisite margaritas at El Colegio. Take relaxation to the next level with a restorative treatment at Mokara Spa.
offer_address: 112 College Street, San Antonio, Texas 78205, USA

title: Elegant Riverfront San Antonio Stay with Rooftop Pool, Three Onsite Restaurants & Spa
description:
Step into an inviting world infused with Southern charm, offering a balance of upscale elegance, rejuvenating spa facilities and genuine hospitality. Situated in close proximity to San Antonio's River Walk, a landmark pedestrian promenade lined with quaint cafes and shops, you will leave feeling pampered after wellness sessions in the dry sauna and eucalyptus-infused steam room.

Picture yourself lounging out by the rooftop pool or sipping cocktails while taking in the city's buzzing ambience. When hunger strikes, dine your way through the three onsite restaurants, from the Oyster Bar at Ostra to the combination of South Texas, Latin and French cuisine at Four Brothers. Discover San Antonio's rich variety of cultural gems such as the Alamo, where pivotal events in Texan history unfolded, and the lively Pearl District, known for its eclectic dining options, weekly farmers market and amphitheatre, providing a lively backdrop for live music and events.
offer_address: 212 West Crockett Street, San Antonio, Texas 78205, United States
